resources.description: A Marketplace REST Api developed in NodeJS
resources.name: marketplace-api

resources.description:
**[POST]** /users
--
**Response:** Status 201 Created

Request Body Model
--
```json
{
  "name": "Name",
  "email": "email@example.com",
  "password": "password"
}
```

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "_id": "5c8dd5b2406bff71bc613934",
  "name": "Name",
  "email": "email@example.com",
  "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:05:54.051Z"
}
```
resources.name: [PUBLIC] Create

resources.description:
**[POST]** /auth
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Request Body Model
--
```json
{
  "email": "email@example.com",
  "password": "password"
}
```

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "user": {
    "_id": "5c8dd5b2406bff71bc613934",
    "name": "Name",
    "email": "email@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:05:54.051Z"
  },
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjV
  jOGRkNWIyNDA2YmZmNzFiYzYxMzkzNCIsImlhdCI6MTU1Mjc5OTIyMiwiZ
  XhwIjoxNTUyO Dg1NjIyfQ.zM4a5H3IittO8Wf3tBw9-rgylpWgCgMZBGI
  tOHE_VYs"
}
```
resources.name: [PUBLIC] auth

resources.description:
**[GET]** /ads
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Query Params Defaults
--
**page:** *1*  
**pageSize:** *10*
**minPrice:** null
**maxPrice:** null
**title:** null

Query Params Models
--
`?page=2`  
`?pageSize=20`  
`?page=2&pageSize=20`  
`?minPrice=50`  
`?maxPrice=200`  
`?title=title%20query%20search`

Response Model
--
```json
{
  "total": 1,
  "limit": 10,
  "offset": 0,
  "page": 1,
  "pages": 1,
  "ads": [
    {
      "_id": "5c8db75daf943e698707b7ce",
      "title": "Title",
      "description": "Description",
      "price": 0,
      "author": {
        "_id": "5c8d765dc7ab644056b42cbd",
        "name": "Name",
        "email": "email@example.com",
        "createdAt": "2019-03-16T22:19:09.041Z"
      },
      "createdAt": "2019-03-17T02:56:29.367Z"
    }
  ]
}
```
resources.name: [PRIVATE] List

resources.description:
**[GET]** /ads/:id
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Params
--
Send the **Ad id** as param `/ads/:id`

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "_id": "5c8dd6c1406bff71bc613935",
  "title": "Title",
  "description": "Description",
  "price": 0,
  "author": {
    "_id": "5c8dd5b2406bff71bc613934",
    "name": "Name",
    "email": "email@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:05:54.051Z"
  },
  "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:10:25.774Z"
}
```

resources.name: [PRIVATE] Create

resources.description:
**[PUT]** /ads/:id
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Params
--
Send the **Ad id** as param `/ads/:id`

Request Body Model
--
*You may send only what was modified*
```json
{
 "title": "New Title",
 "description": "New Description",
 "price": 0
}
```

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "_id": "5c8dd6c1406bff71bc613935",
  "title": "New Title",
  "description": "New Description",
  "price": 0,
  "author": {
    "_id": "5c8dd5b2406bff71bc613934",
    "name": "Name",
    "email": "email@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:05:54.051Z"
  },
  "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:10:25.774Z"
}
```
resources.name: [PRIVATE] Update

resources.description:
**[DELETE]** /ads/:id
--
**Response:** Status 204 No Content

Params
--
Send the **Ad id** as param `/ads/:id`

Request Body Model
--
*No body needed for request*

Response Payload Model
--
*No body returned for response*
resources.name: [PRIVATE] Delete
